content: {"name": "Bishop Griffin Resource Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "https://www.facebook.com/bishopgriffinresourcecenter/", "email": "", "url": "https://bgrc-svdp.org/gethelp", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2867 East Livingston Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Berwick", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43209", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9470579, "longitude": -82.9202949}, "phones": [{"number": "(614) 338-8220", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Thrift Shop"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers available (must bring birth certificate)"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
